College_Name: C.K. Pithawalla College of Engineering and Technology- (CKPCET), Surat
College_Summary: C.K. Pithawalla College of Engineering and Technology, established in 1998 is a private institute which is affiliated to GTU, Ahmedabad and approved by AICTE. CKPCET offers B.Tech programs in various disciplines at the undergraduate level and offers M.Tech in one discipline at the postgraduate level. Admission to the M.Tech course will be done based on the candidates’ performance in Gujarat ACPC entrance exam. The training and placement cell at C.K. Pithawalla College aims at providing 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters that recruit CKPCET students include Infosys, TCS, ICICI Bank, Adani Group, Indian Navy etc.
